author: Predeactor
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not save data about users persistently.
description: Let users complete a captcha before entering the server.
install_msg:
Hello, this cog is in alpha state, this mean you can encounter bugs ***AND I'M NOT JOKING, THIS COG IS CLEARLY UNSTABLE!***
Lot of things are missing, **I suggest you to unload this cog**, but work. You may receive undesired exceptions in your logs.
